Class AdventurePhase

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.GamePhase
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.AdventurePhase
public class AdventurePhase extends GamePhase
Represents the Adventure Phase of the game where each player draws and resolves an AdventureCard. This phase manages state transitions using the AdventureState interface and tracks which player is currently resolving a card.

This phase also handles various actions that players can take in response to the card effects, including using resources, handling damage, and making decisions based on the card type.

    • selectAliens

      public void selectAliens(String username, AlienUnit alienUnit, HousingUnit housingUnit)
      Handles the selection of an AlienUnit by the player during the alien assignment phase. The selected alien is placed in the specified HousingUnit on the player's ship. This action is delegated to the current AdventureState.
      Overrides:
      selectAliens in class GamePhase
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player performing the selection
      alienUnit - the alien unit selected by the player
      housingUnit - the housing unit where the alien is to be placed

    • completedAlienSelection

      public void completedAlienSelection(String username)
      Notifies the system that the player has completed their alien selection phase. This signals that the player is ready to proceed to the next step in the adventure resolution. The behavior is delegated to the current AdventureState.
      Overrides:
      completedAlienSelection in class GamePhase
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player who completed their selection
